turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, 'Bella Italia' is okay, but I was hoping for something a bit less... generic? Like maybe a hidden gem? And can you tell me which restaurants actually *have* vegan options clearly marked on their menu online, not just 'oh, they *might* be able to make something'?
